name: Sandstorm
description: A sandstorm in Gerudo Desert that moves the player to another map if they use the wrong exit.

fields.name: Warp Target Y
fields.description: The Y position of the area to which the player should be warped.

fields.name: Warp Target X
fields.description: The X position of the area to which the player should be warped.

fields.name: Possible Save Exits
fields.description: The directions in which the player can go.

fields.name: Wind Direction
fields.description: In which direction the sand is flying.
